entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH ENDED, Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:14 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Morden AAFC 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: S 19 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
